ai_business_context: The Spot is a new restaurant with a dining room, kitchen, bar, and patio. Customers and staff submit feedback about service quality, cleanliness, and facility/maintenance issues across front-of-house and back-of-house areas.
ai_categorization_instructions: Prefer specific categories. When unsure, use `other` and add a short note to internal context.

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: slow service, wait time, took forever, server, hostess, seating, forgot, check, bill, refills
issue_categories.description: Speed, attentiveness, seating flow, and general service experience.
issue_categories.label: Service (Speed & Attentiveness)

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: rude, attitude, unfriendly, manager, staff behavior, professionalism
issue_categories.description: Staff demeanor, professionalism, and guest interactions.
issue_categories.label: Staff Behavior

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: dirty, sticky, crumbs, spill, trash, bathroom, restroom, smell, flies, gnats, sanitizer
issue_categories.description: Cleanliness and hygiene issues in guest and staff areas.
issue_categories.label: Cleanliness & Hygiene

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: bathroom, restroom, toilet, sink, soap, paper towels, hand dryer, clogged
issue_categories.label: Restroom Issues

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: cold, hot, AC, air conditioning, heater, temperature, draft, ventilation
issue_categories.description: HVAC comfort issues in dining, bar, and patio-adjacent areas.
issue_categories.label: Temperature / HVAC

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: light, lighting, flicker, too dark, bulb, outlet, power, breaker
issue_categories.label: Lighting & Electrical

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: leak, plumbing, faucet, drain, clogged, water, ice machine leak
issue_categories.label: Plumbing / Water

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: broken chair, wobbly table, booth, torn, furniture, high chair
issue_categories.description: Tables, chairs, booths, and other guest furniture issues.
issue_categories.label: Furniture & Seating

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: door, lock, handle, window, patio gate, entrance
issue_categories.description: Doors, locks, and access hardware issues.
issue_categories.label: Doors & Access

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: music too loud, noise, speaker, tv volume
issue_categories.description: Noise level, music volume, and audio system issues.
issue_categories.label: Noise / Music

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: food cold, undercooked, overcooked, wrong order, allergy, quality, taste
issue_categories.description: Food quality, accuracy, and safety concerns.
issue_categories.label: Food Quality / Order Accuracy

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: drink, cocktail, beer, wine, flat, warm beer, wrong drink
issue_categories.description: Beverage quality and bar execution issues.
issue_categories.label: Beverage Quality

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: wifi, internet, qr code, online menu, payment terminal, card reader, POS
issue_categories.label: Tech / Payment

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: safety, hazard, slippery, broken glass, emergency exit, fire extinguisher
issue_categories.label: Safety Hazards

issue_categories.description: Use when category is unclear; add a short note in internal context.
issue_categories.label: Other

comments.body: Thanks for flagging—restroom supplies should be checked hourly. We’re updating the checklist.

issues.description: Women’s restroom: out of paper towels and the soap dispenser is nearly empty.

reports.body: No paper towels in the women’s bathroom and the soap barely comes out.

updates.message: Restocked paper towels and refilled soap. Added to hourly restroom check sheet.

issues.description: Dining room table surfaces feel sticky, especially near the window seating.

reports.body: Our table was sticky like it wasn’t wiped with cleaner. Not a huge deal but noticeable.
Same—window-side tables feel tacky. Might be the cleaner leaving residue?

updates.message: Team reminded to use fresh sanitizer buckets and finish with a clean dry wipe to prevent residue.

comments.body: Food was great once it came, but we waited a long time just to get water refills.

issues.description: Slow drink refills and long wait to get the check during dinner rush.

reports.body: Waited ~20 minutes for the check and had to ask twice for water refills.

updates.message: Shift lead reviewing section assignments and adding a dedicated runner during peak 6–8pm.

issues.description: Dining room feels unusually cold near the entrance; noticeable draft when the door opens.

reports.body: It was chilly by the front door—drafty enough that we kept our jackets on.

updates.message: Noted draft near entry. Checking door sweep and adjusting HVAC vent direction for front zone.

issues.description: Patio door handle is loose and the door sticks when closing.

reports.body: The patio door handle wiggles a lot and the door sticks—hard to close behind you.

updates.message: Temporary tightening completed; parts ordered for full handle/strike plate replacement.

issues.description: Light above the bar flickers intermittently, especially later at night.

reports.body: One of the pendant lights over the bar kept flickering—kind of distracting.

comments.body: We’ve been mopping it up but it keeps coming back. Please prioritize—slip risk.

issues.description: Small leak under the bar sink causing a wet floor behind the bar.

reports.body: There’s water pooling under the bar sink again. Floor gets slick behind the bar.

updates.message: Placed absorbent mat and caution sign; maintenance scheduled to inspect trap and supply lines.

issues.description: Burger order came out undercooked compared to requested temperature.

reports.body: Asked for medium, it was closer to rare. Server fixed it, but wanted to mention.

updates.message: Kitchen reviewed temp chart and added a quick call-back step for burger temps during rush.

issues.description: Draft beer pours with too much foam; pints coming up short.

reports.body: My IPA was like half foam. Bartender repoured but it happened twice.
Noticed the taps seem off—lots of foam on multiple beers.

updates.message: Checked keg temps and CO2 pressure; scheduled line cleaning and regulator calibration.

issues.description: Wobbly two-top table on the patio; feels unstable when leaning on it.

reports.body: Patio table near the string lights wobbles a lot—spilled my drink a bit.

updates.message: Tagged table for repair; adding shims now and replacing base if needed.

issues.description: Music volume in the dining room is too loud for conversation during lunch.

reports.body: Could barely hear my friend across the table—music was blasting at noon.

updates.message: Set daytime volume cap and created lunch/dinner presets on the audio system.

issues.description: QR code menu link on patio table tent leads to a 404 page.

reports.body: Scanned the QR on the patio and it said page not found. Had to ask for a paper menu.

updates.message: Updated QR redirect and replaced patio table tents with corrected codes.

issues.description: Spill near the soda station wasn’t marked; floor was slippery.

reports.body: Almost slipped by the soda/ice area—there was a puddle and no wet floor sign.

updates.message: Reinforced spill response: immediate cone placement + mop. Added extra wet-floor signs near soda station.

issues.description: Patio area has gnats/flies around the trash can; noticeable odor.

reports.body: Lots of little flies by the patio trash and it smelled. Might need more frequent emptying.

updates.message: Increased patio trash pull frequency and added lid + deodorizer. Pest control consult scheduled.

issues.description: Host stand: long wait to be greeted despite open tables.

reports.body: We stood at the host stand for about 7 minutes before anyone acknowledged us. There were empty tables.

issues.description: Suggestion: add hooks under the bar for purses/bags. (Other: guest convenience request.)

reports.body: Would love small hooks under the bar stools for purses—nowhere to put a bag except the floor.

updates.message: Noted as a potential small improvement; pricing out discreet under-bar hooks.

locations.name: Main Floor
